about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Virtuoso Optoelectronics Limited manufactures consumer durable goods, assembles a wide array of products and provide end-to-end product solutions. The company's current product portfolio of consumer goods includes (I) Split Air Conditioners; (ii) Water Heaters; (iii) LED Lighting products; and (iv) other miscellaneous products such as injection moulding components for air conditioners.

Virtuoso Optoelectronics Limited serve under both original equipment manufacturer ("OEM") and original design manufacturer ("ODM") business models. Under the OEM model, the company manufacture and supplies products basis designs developed by the customers, who then further distribute these products under their brands. Under the ODM model, in addition to manufacturing, the company conceptualize and design the products which are then marketed to the customers' prospective customers under their brands.

The company has two manufacturing facilities which are strategically located in and around Nashik (Maharashtra).

Virtuoso Optoelectronics Limited also has a centralized R&D centre in Nashik (Maharashtra), focusing on the research and development of all aspects of OEM and ODM models including concept sketching, design refinement, generating optional features and testing.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Infrastructure and Integrated Manufacturing Facility.
  • Culture of innovation and highly experienced and young management.
  • Constant focus on developing new and innovative products.
  • Economies of Scale.
  • R&D and product design capabilities lead to ODM business generation.
  • Availability of Performance Linked Incentives.
  • Strong relationships with a diverse top-tier customer base.

faqs.question: What is the Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO is a SME IPO of 5400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹56 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 2, 2022, and closes on September 7, 2022.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO opens on September 2, 2022 and closes on September 7, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO?
faqs.answer: Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO will be done on Monday, September 12, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 14, 2022. Check the Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Virtuoso Optoelectronics IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 15, 2022.
